name: iMASSAGE
description:
___________________________________________

iMASSAGE is a FREE app that turns your Xbox One, Xbox 360 or PlayStation 4 controller into your own personal massager!

___________________________________________

Free & Pro Features:

 _

*Pro* 20 Massage Patterns

20 massage patterns in the Pro Edition!

 _

*Pro* Dual Gamepad Support

Use up to two gamepads at once! Play alone or with a friend!

 _

*Pro* PS4 Lightbar Integration

Have your PS4 gamepads light up while in use!

 _

10 Massage Patterns

10 massage patterns in the Free Edition!

 _

3 Massage Modes

Rumble, vibrate or both allow you to customise the type of vibration you want

_

9 Massage Strengths

Increase and decrease vibration intensity as desired

 _

One Handed Controls

Gamepad can be operated with one hand!

_

Easy Controls

Easy to use controls, right on the gamepad!

 _

Onscreen Controls Guide

Always know what to press when you need it

_

Dual Locking System

Lock the controllers via button press and/or with an on screen lock. Ensuring you never press an unwanted button during use. 

 _

Hot Swap Controllers

No need to restart the app when a controller is disconnected or when switching between different controllers. 

_

Available NOW for Windows & MacOS !

_

___________________________________________

iMASSAGE Free Edition Includes 10 massage patterns & single gamepad support for  free! $FREE$ iMASSAGE Free Edition for Windows iMASSAGE Free Edition for MacOS

___________________________________________

iMASSAGE Pro Edition Includes 20 massage patterns, dual gamepad support & PS4 lightbar integration! $1.99USD$ iMASSAGE Pro Edition for Windows iMASSAGE Pro Edition for MacOS

___________________________________________

*The massaging functions and strength of this app vary depending on the controller used. Other controllers outside of Xbox One, Xbox 360 & PS4 controllers may work but not guaranteed or tested.* 

*Xbox controllers do not work on the MacOS version, however PS4 controllers do.* 

*Switch controllers may be compatible with this app but it has not been tested.*

*Connecting controllers via Bluetooth also untested*
